project.name: C-C833A-SUBV-09-ST04-DT07-DF01-CF23-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C833A-SUBV-09-ST04-DT07-DF01-CF23-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository This weakness expects a string in the form: '<qsize> <data>' where qsize is the size of the quick sort (used to delay execution), and data is a string containing no spaces. If the data string contains underscores, spawn two threads - one to replace the underscores with hyphens, and one to capitalize it. The two threads get two separate locks, but they try to obtain them in reverse order. If the qsort is large enough, these attempts to get the locks will interleave, resulting in deadlock. In order to hit the weakness, qsize >= 5000000, and the data string must have underscores in it.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 5371 -s 110 -m "1 /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/fifo2 /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/fifo1 a_test" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid") && echo "Killed script."; else echo "Failed: Script PID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C833A-SUBV-09-ST04-DT07-DF01-CF23-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file This weakness expects a string in the form: '<qsize> <data>' where qsize is the size of the quick sort (used to delay execution), and data is a string containing no spaces. If the data string contains underscores, spawn two threads - one to replace the underscores with hyphens, and one to capitalize it. The two threads get two separate locks, but they try to obtain them in reverse order. If the qsort is large enough, these attempts to get the locks will interleave, resulting in deadlock. In order to hit the weakness, qsize >= 5000000, and the data string must have underscores in it.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 5371 -s 110 -m "60 /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/fifo2 /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/fifo1 abigwordwithoutunderscores" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"
cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid") && echo "Killed script."; else echo "Failed: Script PID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_skjbUw4QR7 OR (NOT (finished_xlHeUcQQlm AND finished_Ih4j7DIppz AND finished_pLWdTdJBq5 AND finished_Vo12CbRSdA) AND NOT (controlled_exit_RZMxWE2EKB OR continued_execution_cM9WiOz7Eg)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_skjbUw4QR7 OR (NOT (finished_xlHeUcQQlm AND finished_Ih4j7DIppz AND finished_pLWdTdJBq5 AND finished_Vo12CbRSdA) AND NOT (controlled_exit_RZMxWE2EKB OR continued_execution_cM9WiOz7Eg))) OR controlled_exit_RZMxWE2EKB))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "toCap: Releasing lock 1" "../logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
if (( $(/bin/grep "toCap: Releasing lock 0" "../logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
if (( $(/bin/grep "replace: Releasing lock 1" "../logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
if (( $(/bin/grep "replace: Releasing lock 0" "../logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
